segments.text: Looking at this drawing, the kitchen seems ordinary at first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight filters through the window, highlighting the sink area.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's focused on her task, towel in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the water from the faucet is gushing out uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's overflowing the sink and soaking everything below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is gross, spreading like a stain.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing in it, completely ignorant of the filth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked to the side look clean, but not for long.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the kids are causing their own trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that flimsy stool, grabbing cookies greedily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tipping; what a reckless way to get treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just enabling him, hand out expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar's label is clear, tempting them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden's tidy, unlike this messy interior.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such carelessness all around.
segments.speaker: PAR
